Episodes.Title: Chapter 14
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Kate Mara
Episodes.Plot: Frank prepares for his promotion to Vice President. Doug tries to erase all leads leading back to him and Frank. Claire fights back against Gillian. Zoe considers working with Frank again.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 15
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: Frank is announced as Vice President. The US meets with China. Jackie faces obstacles as she plans to run for new whip. Lucas looks into Zoe's death.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 16
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: The tension between Francis and Raymond Tusk increases while the situation in China is getting worse. A fight in the Senate puts Francis against the republicans.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 17
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Mahershala Ali
Episodes.Plot: A Terror threat traps Francis in the Congress building with a bitter Donald Blythe. Claire gives a live interview that shakes the media.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 18
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: Francis resorts to informal negotiations with a Chinese billionaire. Lucas takes extreme measures in use to reveal the vice president. Team Underwood gets a new member.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 19
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: In the middle of an energy crisis, Francis and Tusk end their fragile alliance. Lucas must make a difficult choice. Stamper gets closer to Rachel.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 20
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Wonsup Chung
Episodes.Plot: Despite friction, the friendship between the Walkers and the Underwoods becomes stronger. But there's a war between Francis and Tusk.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 21
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: The war with Tusk intensified. Claire influences Tricia Walker, both on the political and domestic front.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 22
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: It becomes personal when Tusk hits the Underwood pair with a scandal. Freddy and his restaurant will be involved in it all.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 23
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: With a military stalemate abroad and a possible violent situation at home, Francis wants to put an end to Tusk forever. Claire and Jackie Sharp collide.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 24
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: Frank is questioned by a special prosecutor. Remy Danton is trying to keep all options open. Stamper is struggling with his demons.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 25
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: Francis feels shut out. Stamper tries to regain control.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 26
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: Francis is about to be destroyed while the nation is in turmoil. Stamper must pick up loose ends. Claire marks the conclusion of her ruthlessness.
